Denver's a happy town these days I always enjoy walking in Denver but now there's a palpable joy around every corner whether you partake or not it's hard not to smile at all the people buying legal marijuana and riding around on scooters
This city seems to have attracted like minded people from all around the country who agreed that life was better when they were ten
